file_url.title: File URL
file_url.description: URL of the archive file to download and extract (supports .zip, .tar, .tar.gz, .tgz, .tar.bz2, .tbz2, .7z)

folder_path.title: Output Folder Path
folder_path.description: Path where extracted files will be saved (default: ./storage/extracted)

max_file_size_mb.title: Max File Size (MB)
max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size in megabytes to process

file_name_prefix.title: File Name Prefix
file_name_prefix.description: Optional prefix to add to extracted file names
